clumpy.definition.TransitionPatches¶

class clumpy.definition.TransitionPatches(isl_patches=None, exp_patches=None, isl_ratio=1.0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Patches informations for a given transition

Parameters

  • isl_patches (BootstrapPatchParams, default=None) – The island patch parameters. Unexpected to be None if ratio>0.

  • exp_patches (BootstrapPatchParams, default=None) – The expansion patch parameters. Unexpected to be None if ratio<1.

  • isl_ratio (float) – The ratio of island areas over the whole areas to allocate.

Previous topic

clumpy.definition.BootstrapPatches

Next topic

clumpy.scenario.TransitionMatrix
